mapper.select: SELECT o.id,t.trade_num,t.create_time,o.report_time,o.unscramble_content,o.status, p.name AS package_name,p.pic_url from app_c_trade t LEFT JOIN app_c_order o on t.id=o.trade_id LEFT JOIN app_c_package p on o.package_id=p.id where t.applicant_id=#{applyId} and t.status>1 ORDER BY t.ordered_time DESC
